Text:
Well, the thanks seems to be fewer nowadays, me included I'm afraid!
Seems we take you for granted.
I just want you to know that all those wonderful (or should that be awful :-) ) movies you share are appreciated very much indeed!
Thank you very much!

It's all good Fruster, I know that these 'gems' are appreciated by the fact that nearly all are still seeded.  I'm just happy that I can get these out as that age of cinema was so very important to me as I'm sure it was for you.  You have always been here and I hope you enjoy the others that are yet to come.

Thanks mate!
Great- Thank you!  this one is really a classic>

You Are My New HERO.!.Sorry to be LEECHING.then.RUNNING..Back in The US,,Hence The Tag,,That Be My Name Here..YOU Know That Ain't My Style..I'm Rushing To Get The Biggest Collection Possible of Horror,,and..Sci.Fi..BAD..B-Movies.!!.Planning to open a Free Admission. ".Drive.. In.".Where Most People Don't have Running Water,,Much less Electricity.!!
God Bless You My Brother..BAT..

THANK YOU! THANK YOU! THANK YOU!  
I saw this on TV when I was a kid. Now I can share it with my nephews.  :-D
I read about this fantastic movie. Thanks!
